resources.string: This lovely starfield spans some four full moons.
Search you\'re interested term in Wikipedia

"In this section you can see the photos that the rovers took during their missions:

" "Curiosity – fulfills his duty to this day and sends photos to earth.

" "Opportunity – on June 12, 2018, he stopped communicating due to a powerful dust storm. 

" "Spirit – in May 2009, he got stuck in a sand dune, as a result of which he lost contact with the Earth on March 22, 2010. 

" "Here you can view photos from the rover, for this you need to choose the model of the rover, its camera from which the photos were taken, as well as the earth date when the photos came. The date is selected in the calendar by short pressing, or in the text line by holding, and then press search.

" "If a photo of Mars is displayed, it means that no photo was taken on this day or from this camera. 

" "To see which cameras are on which rover, follow the link -> Browse APIs -> Mars Rover Photos ->Rover Cameras

Enjoy using the app!"
"Dear User,\nHere you will find answers on how to use the section to search for photos from rovers"
